description: A case to put together yourself - Puzzle X Crime is a combination of exciting crime and puzzle fun! First, the crime scene is put together from 408 puzzle pieces, then the puzzlers take on the role of the investigators. Which objects in the scene should be examined more closely? The numbers on the back of the puzzle pieces lead to playing cards and envelopes with important evidence. Will you be able to combine all the clues correctly and track down the perpetrators? Puzzle meets crime game! The popular game principle, in which you examine a case file with evidence and solve a crime, is now also available as a Ravensburger puzzle - Puzzle X Crime! The highlight: the puzzle is also printed with numbers on the back, which provide valuable clues to solving the case. Intuition, deduction skills and a detective instinct are then required! Together with the included playing cards and the evidence in envelopes, the puzzlers gradually determine the course of events and can find the perpetrator, the motive and the weapon used. Also ideal as a joint puzzle and investigation fun! No game material needs to be destroyed and the Puzzle X Crime can be played again.
